mapper.select: select p.module_name p_name,p.link_url p_url,c.module_name c_name,c.link_url c_url from tb_user u join tb_role r join tb_user_role ur join tb_role_module rm join tb_module p join tb_module c on u.user_id = ur.user_id and r.role_id = ur.role_id and p.module_code = rm.module_id and r.role_id = rm.role_id and p.module_code = c.parent_module and p.parent_module = '0101' and u.user_login_account = #{account};

select m.module_id moduleId,m.module_code moduleCode,m.module_name moduleName,m.link_url linkUrl,m.module_order moduleOrder, m.parent_module parentModule,m.module_desc moduleDesc,m.expanded expanded,m.leaf leaf from tb_user u JOIN tb_role r JOIN tb_user_role ur JOIN tb_module m join tb_role_module rm on u.user_id = ur.user_id and r.role_id = ur.role_id and rm.module_id = m.module_code and rm.role_id = r.role_id and u.user_login_account = #{account};

select DISTINCT p.module_name p_name,p.link_url p_url,c.module_name c_name,c.link_url c_url, case when exists( select * from ( select c.module_name c_name1 from tb_role r join tb_role_module rm join tb_module p join tb_module c on c.module_code = rm.module_id and r.role_id = rm.role_id and p.module_code = c.parent_module and p.parent_module = '0101' and r.role_name = #{roleName} ) role_module where role_module.c_name1 = c.module_name ) then 'true' else 'false' end checked from tb_module p join tb_module c on p.module_code = c.parent_module and p.parent_module = '0101';
